1  var Phaser = require('phaser');

3  function Boot(game) {
4    console.debug("creating Boot state!", game);
5  }

14  Boot.prototype.create = function () {
15    var game = this.game;
16

18
¶

max number of fingers to detect unless you specifically know your game needs to support multi-touch I would recommend setting this to 1

 
18  
19    this.input.maxPointers = 1;
20  
21  
22
¶

auto pause if window loses focus Phaser will automatically pause if the browser tab the game is in loses focus. You can disable that here:

 
22  
23    game.stage.disableVisibilityChange = true;
24  
25  
26
¶

If you have any desktop specific settings, they can go in here

 
25  
26    if (game.device.desktop) {
27      game.stage.scale.pageAlignHorizontally = true;
28    } else {
29  
30
¶

Any mobile-specific settiings go here. In this case we're saying "scale the game, no lower than 480x260 and no higher than 1024x768"

 
30  
31      game.stage.scaleMode = Phaser.StageScaleMode.SHOW_ALL;
32      game.stage.scale.minWidth = 480;
33      game.stage.scale.minHeight = 260;
34      game.stage.scale.maxWidth = 1024;
35      game.stage.scale.maxHeight = 768;
36      game.stage.scale.forceLandscape = true;
37      game.stage.scale.pageAlignHorizontally = true;
38      game.stage.scale.setScreenSize(true);
39    }
40  
41  
42
¶

By this point the preloader assets have loaded to the cache, we've set the game settings So now let's start the real preloader going

 
42  
43    game.state.start('preloader');
44  };
45  
46  module.exports = Boot;
